The Legends Library is a resource for players of the modern horror MMORPG the Secret World and Secret World: Legends by Funcom. All in-game Legends (or Lore, as some players might know them) are compiled into a searchable database for reading or research. The author hopes that you enjoy this resource, made completely free and ad-free to you, as you peer into the world of secret societies, magic, and twisting horrors. \n\nBut don\'t look too deeply, sweetling…

The Legends Library is an off-line app. It collects no information about you, your device, or your habits. It does not communicate to any outside servers. Rest assured that the author is not an agent of the Illuminati (or any other secret society) and has no interest or desire to collect or sell any information about you to third-parties, especially without your consent.

The author is unaffiliated with Funcom, and this app is not authorized or endorsed by the Company.

I am reachable by email, Twitter, and Tumblr. Tumblr is also the development blog where you may follow the progress of this app. All feedback, suggestions, and bug reports are welcome. \n\nMy character\'s name is Markel. Give me a wave if you happen to see me in the game!
